title: Something Good Is Here Right Now! (Holly Furtick)
description: Sometimes, we need to slow down to see the good that’s right in front of us. In “Something Good Is Here Right Now!” Holly Furtick reveals that hope and joy may be closer than we think.
dc:creator: Elevation Church
itunes:summary: Sometimes, we need to slow down to see the good that’s right in front of us. In “Something Good Is Here Right Now!” Holly Furtick reveals that hope and joy may be closer than we think.
